Title: Sweet Amerika
Writer: R. Paul Dhillon, Kristopher Gee, Jesse Thind, Jessi Thind
Actors: Gulshan Grover, Sian Sladen, David Stuart, Kit Koon
Plot: The story of Balbir Singh Gill aka Bobby, a Sikh grocery store owner who is kidnapped and tortured by four Americans who mistake him for a Muslim because he wears a turban.
